transactionListColumns.returnAuthorizati.title: Transaction list columns Return Authorization
transactionListColumns.returnAuthorizati.description: Use these fields to assign custom column headings for My Account > Purchases > Returns.

id.title: ID
id.description: Enter the Field ID of the field you want to render. Valid values: trandate, quantity, and amount_formatted.

label.title: Label
label.description: Enter the title you want to use for this column.

transactionListColumns.enableReturnAutho.title: Enable Return Authorization columns management
transactionListColumns.enableReturnAutho.description: Check this box to enable Return Authorization Columns Management.
